mapper.select: SELECT rsv_no, rsv_date, rsv_start_time, rsv_end_time, rsv_title, rsv_mem_nm, rsv_color, rsv_confirm_state, rsv_conf_no FROM RESERVATION
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET rsv_date = #{rsvDate}, rsv_total_time = #{rsvTotalTime}, rsv_start_time = #{rsvStartTime}, rsv_end_time = #{rsvEndTime}, rsv_title = #{rsvTitle}, rsv_mem_nm = #{rsvMemNm}, rsv_mem_pn = #{rsvMemPn}, rsv_mem_em = #{rsvMemEm}, rsv_color = #{rsvColor}, rsv_email_check = #{rsvEmailCheck}, rsv_conf_no = #{rsvConfNo}, rsv_confirm_state = #{rsvConfirmState} WHERE rsv_no = #{rsvNo}
UPDATE RESERVATION SET rsv_start_time = #{rsvStartTime}, rsv_end_time = #{rsvEndTime}, rsv_conf_no = #{rsvConfNo}, rsv_total_time = #{rsvTotalTime} WHERE rsv_no = #{rsvNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE RSV_DATE Between DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(CURDATE())-2) * -1 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(CURDATE())-6) * -1 DAY) AND TIME_FORMAT(RSV_TOTAL_TIME, '%H') > #{rsvMaxTime} AND rsv_title LIKE #{rsvTitle} OR replace(RSV_TITLE,' ','') = replace(#{rsvTitle},' ','') AND rsv_mem_pn = #{rsvMemPn}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET rsv_start_time = #{rsvStartTime}, rsv_end_time = #{rsvEndTime}, rsv_total_time = #{rsvTotalTime}, rsv_confirm_state = #{rsvConfirmState} WHERE rsv_no = #{rsvNo}
mapper.select: select RESERVATION.* , CONFERENCE.CONF_NM from RESERVATION, CONFERENCE WHERE RSV_DATE = #{wantDate} AND RSV_CONF_NO = CONF_NO AND RSV_CONFIRM_STATE !='N' order by CONF_NO ASC, RSV_START_TIME ASC;

SELECT R.RSV_NO, R.RSV_DATE, R.RSV_TOTAL_TIME, R.RSV_START_TIME, R.RSV_END_TIME, R.RSV_TITLE, R.RSV_MEM_NM, R.RSV_MEM_PN, R.RSV_MEM_EM, R.RSV_DEL_PWD, R.RSV_REG_DATE, R.RSV_CONFIRM_STATE, R.RSV_REPEAT_SEQ, R.RSV_EMAIL_CHECK, C.CONF_NM, R.RSV_REPEAT_PERIOD, R.RSV_SETTING, R.RSV_REPEAT_NO
FROM RESERVATION R, CONFERENCE C WHERE R.RSV_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND RSV_DATE <= #{deleteDate} ORDER BY R.RSV_REPEAT_NO ASC, R.RSV_DATE ASC
select min(rsv_date) as firstDay, max(rsv_date) as lastDay FROM RESERVATION where rsv_repeat_no = (select rsv_repeat_no from reservation where rsv_no=#{rsvNo})
